Q. 36 - Q. 65 Carry ONE mark Each 
Question 36 
 
An exhibition was held in a hall on 15 August 2022 between 3 PM and 4 PM during which any person was 
allowed to enter only once. Visitors who entered before 3:40 PM exited the hall exactly after 20 minutes from 
their time of entry. Visitors who entered at or after 3:40 PM, exited exactly at 4 PM. The probability distribution 
of the arrival time of any visitor is uniform between 3 PM and 4 PM. Two persons 
𝑋 
and 
𝑌 
entered the 
exhibition hall independent of each other. Which one of the following values is the probability that their visits 
to the exhibition overlapped with each other?
[Engineering Mathematics, Probability]
(A) 
5

9
(B) 
4

9
(C) 
2

9
(D) 
7
9
answer_text:
(B)  
Sol.
